description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. To celebrate Hurdle Turtle's 3rd birthday and the upcoming release of Hurdle Turtle 2, we proudly present this 2nd companion to the original game which can also be enjoyed as a standalone title.  Take Hurdle Turtle through a gauntlet of holiday themed levels and keep challenging your own hiscores until the sequel arrives this fall!
description.short: To celebrate Hurdle Turtle's 3rd birthday and the upcoming release of Hurdle Turtle 2, we proudly present this 2nd companion to the original game which can also be enjoyed as a standalone title.  Take Hurdle Turtle through a gauntlet of holiday themed levels and keep challenging your own hiscores until the sequel arrives this fall!
